title: I hate it when I see plat borders on my team now, because chances are they bought that Rank
body: The amount of times I've gotten stuck with players that have mastery Rank 7 and a plat border only for them to then play like they have the mechanics of a beginner AI is depressing.

Just because a plat player does bad doesn't mean they're boosted. I feed all the time in norms when I'm just fucking around and trying out troll builds and stuff. You'd be suprised how chimp-like players in plat can be, even in ranked games.
